title: ICE: failed to resolve instance in static-la v0.2.5

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code `cargo build --tests` in [static-la v0.2.5](https://crates.io/crates/static-la/0.2.5) ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (065852def 2023-02-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 065852def0903296da33a9eaf557f230bcf3a61a commit-date: 2023-02-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/instance.rs:397:18: failed to resolve instance for as From<[[&i32; 2]; 1]>>::from ```
Backtrace
